Message:
Once those words left
the lips of that “shadow,”
she drew her final breath.

Since I was born, there hath been
countless attempts on my life.

And each time, there hath been
someone who died in my stead.

In my youth, the deaths of servants
would at times unsettle my heart.
But now, not one emotion
stirs within me.

Of course, such is the way.
The duty of my shadows
is to keep me alive,
while surviving peril is mine.

Therefore, I alone
must continue to live.
